title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]

title: Early Travellers in Scotland. Edited by P. Hume Brown. [With maps.]
author: Brown, Peter Hume.
snippet: The library still exists, and is known as the Bibliotheca Leightoniensis, which is inscribed on the present building. 2 From the reign of James VI., Linlithgow Palace had been little more than the occasional residence of the Earls of Livingstone.
